name: Creative Minds
description: Insights on creativity and innovation from artists, writers, and inventors.
author: Quips Editorial

quotes.content: Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world.
Every child is an artist. The problem is how to remain an artist once we grow up.
The chief enemy of creativity is good sense.
You can't use up creativity. The more you use, the more you have.
To be creative means to be in love with life.
The desire to create is one of the deepest yearnings of the human soul.
Imagination is the beginning of creation.
